text: Dear all , Hannicha has found some fashion designers and manufacturers who can still provide fabric  to make masks. But she needs sponsors /donators to finance this. Could you try to help her find some sponsors, or enterprises who would be willing to participate financially? If you have any ideas, you can contact her on   <mailto:hananext@gmail.com|hananext@gmail.com>  Thank you for your attention.:hugging_face:
